info.title: Outreach
info.description: Church outreach admin platform. API documentation.

post.description: Registers new super-admin if it does not exist already. Use strong password. The password must be at least 8 characters long. The password must contain at least one uppercase letter. The password must contain at least one number. The password must contain at least one special character. Password also can just be a pass-phrase as explained here https://xkcd.com/936/. Example pass-phrase: 'correct horse battery staple'

requestBody.description: The username and password of the new super-admin

post.description: Super-admin register a new admin user. Creating a new admin requires a super-admin token. Admin cannot create another admin. If an admin with the same username exists, the new admin cannot be created.

get.description: If the requesting user is admin return only the requesting admin user data. When super-admin, return all admins data. That will be used when the super-admin manages other admin accounts, such as deleting or updating other admins

If the requesting user is admin return only the requesting admin user data. A super-admin, can get any admin data by ID. That will be used when the super-admin manages other admin accounts, such as deleting or updating other admins
get.summary: Return a single admin by ID

put.description: Update password by ID. If the requesting user (super)-admin change its own password response will return success. When a super-admin updates a password of other admins a temporary password will be returned. A request body is not required in this case. An admin is only allowed to update its own password.
put.summary: Return success or a temporary password

requestBody.description: Old password and new password to update

delete.description: If super-admin can delete all, else delete self

get.description: Return church information. Only one should be needed, but more than one can be created to facilitate editing. For example, create a new one and delete the old record can give safe update.

requestBody.description: Church information to add. You can change the 'am' block with Amharic content. You don't need to enter 'adminname' value as it will be overwritten by the username of the request object.

get.description: Return a church information by ID. Use the GET /info route to get the ID.

put.description: Updates church information by ID. You don't need to enter 'adminname' value as it will be overwritten by the username of the request object.

get.description: The content in the introduction section of the homepage

post.description: Add the main content of the home page

get.description: Return a homepage main content by ID. Multiple introductions could be stored. And could be used in different yearly events.
get.summary: Returns homepage introduction content by ID

put.description: Updates homepage introduction content by ID

delete.description: Deletes homepage introduction content by ID

delete.summary: Deletes a home page main content

put.description: Updates a blog by an ID

delete.description: Deletes a blog matches an ID

title.example: ኪዳነምህረት እናቴ KidaneMihret Enatie- Best Ethiopian Orthodox Mezmurs
ኪዳነምህረት እናቴ KidaneMihret Enatie- Best Ethiopian Orthodox Mezmurs
ኪዳነምህረት እናቴ KidaneMihret Enatie- Best Ethiopian Orthodox Mezmurs
ኪዳነምህረት እናቴ KidaneMihret Enatie- Best Ethiopian Orthodox Mezmurs

put.description: Updates a video/audio by an ID

title.example: ኪዳነምህረት እናቴ KidaneMihret Enatie- Best Ethiopian Orthodox Mezmurs
ኪዳነምህረት እናቴ KidaneMihret Enatie- Best Ethiopian Orthodox Mezmurs

delete.description: Deletes a video/audio matches an ID

title.example: ኪዳነምህረት እናቴ KidaneMihret Enatie- Best Ethiopian Orthodox Mezmurs

body.description: The main content of the blog

title.example: እንኳን ለጌታችን ለመድኃኒታችን ለኢየሱስ ክርስቶስ የዕርገት በዓል አደረሳችሁ!!!

name.example: St. George Ethiopian Orthodox Tewahedo Church

verse.example: And I tell you that you are Peter,and on this rock I will build my church, and the gates of Hadeswill not overcome it.

long_text.example: የትንሣኤያችን በኩር የሆነው ጌታ በመቃብሩ ቦታ ሥርዓትን እያስተማረ አልፎ አልፎም በግልጥ እየታየ ፍርሐታቸውን እያስወገደ አይሑድ እንደሚሉት ሥጋውንም ደቀመዛሙርቱ እንዳልሰረቁት ይልቁንም በሞት ላይ ሥልጣንኑን አሳይቶ መቃብሩን ባዶ አድርጐ በትንሣኤው አለት ላይ ያቆመን፣ ሞት በእርሱ እንደተሸነፈ የማይታየው እየታየ፣ ዘመን የማይቆጠርለት፣ ዘላለማዊ ጌታ የማይዳሰሰው እየተዳሰሰ ለ40 ቀናት ያኽል ቆይቶ ተከታዮቹን ሐዋርያትን ወደ ቢታንያ አወጣቸው። እያዩት በምስጋና ወደሰማይ ዐረገ።
